Chapter.Label: Non-isomorphoric Algebras
Chapter.Heading: Small Algebras
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small SymmetricSystem AllSmallSymmetricSystem is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic SymmetricSystem of orders 2 to 7.
<#Include Label = "AllSmallSymmetricSystem">
The output symmetricsystem are represented by its operation table for *, as given in Section .

Checking Models of Small SymmetricSystem
"IsASmallSymmetricSystem" is a function for checking a model against the complete list of non-isomorphic SymmetricSystem of orders 2 to 7. It returns true if the model is a Small SymmetricSystem, false otherwise.
<#Include Label = "IsASmallSymmetricSystem">
